title: Social Media Marketing Specialist (Full-Time, Long-Term)
description:
================================================================================

ABOUT ENTVAS TECHNOLOGY

================================================================================



Entvas Technology is a US-based custom software development and technology consulting company headquartered in St. Petersburg, Florida. We specialize in building AI-ready, end-to-end business systems for growing companies.



We help businesses transition from scattered, disconnected tools to unified, custom platforms that streamline operations and prepare them for the AI-driven future. 



We're a small but growing team that values initiative, clear communication, and people who take ownership of their work.



================================================================================

THE OPPORTUNITY

================================================================================



We're looking for a Social Media Marketing Specialist who can own our entire social media presence—from strategy to execution. This isn't a "just post content" role. We need someone who thinks like a marketer, understands lead generation, and can connect social media efforts to real business results.



You'll be the person driving our brand visibility, creating engaging content, and building systems that generate qualified leads for a B2B technology company.



If you're someone who gets excited about creating content strategies that actually work, analyzing what's performing, and continuously improving—we want to hear from you.



================================================================================

WHAT YOU'LL BE DOING

================================================================================



STRATEGY & PLANNING

- Develop and execute social media strategies aligned with business goals

- Create monthly content calendars across all platforms

- Research industry trends, competitors, and audience behavior

- Plan campaigns that drive traffic, engagement, and lead generation

- Track performance metrics and adjust strategies based on data



CONTENT CREATION

- Design eye-catching graphics for social media posts (LinkedIn,
, Instagram, X/Twitter)

- Write compelling copy that speaks to business decision-makers

- Adapt content for different platforms and audiences

- Maintain consistent brand voice and visual identity



COMMUNITY & ENGAGEMENT

- Manage daily posting and engagement across all platforms

- Respond to comments, messages, and mentions professionally

- Build relationships with followers and industry connections

- Identify opportunities for brand visibility and thought leadership



REPORTING & OPTIMIZATION

- Monitor analytics and report on key performance indicators

- A/B test content to improve engagement rates

- Provide insights and recommendations based on performance data

- Stay current with platform algorithm changes and best practices



================================================================================

REQUIRED QUALIFICATIONS

================================================================================



MUST HAVE:

- 2+ years of experience in social media marketing (B2B experience strongly preferred)

- Proven track record of growing social media accounts and driving engagement

- Strong graphic design skills using Adobe Creative Suite (Photoshop, Illustrator) OR Canva Pro

- Excellent written English communication skills

- Strategic thinking ability—you understand HOW social media drives business results

- Experience creating content calendars and executing consistently

- Portfolio showing your design work and content examples

- Reliable internet connection and dedicated workspace



NICE TO HAVE (Big Plus):

- Video content creation and editing experience (Reels, short-form video)

- Paid social media advertising experience 
 Ads, LinkedIn Ads)

- Experience with AI tools for content creation (ChatGPT, Midjourney, etc.)

- Experience marketing for technology, software, or professional services companies

- Basic understanding of SEO and how social media supports organic search

- Experience with social media management tools (Buffer, Hootsuite, Later, etc.)



================================================================================

WORK SCHEDULE & ARRANGEMENT

================================================================================



- Full-time: 40 hours per week

- US time zone overlap required: You must be available during US Eastern Time business hours for at least 4-5 hours daily (we can discuss exact schedule)

- This may mean working evenings or early mornings Philippine time

- Long-term position with opportunity for growth

- You'll communicate primarily via Slack and video calls



================================================================================

WHAT WE OFFER

================================================================================



- Competitive salary: $800 - $1,200/month (up to $1,500 for exceptional candidates with strong portfolios)

- Long-term, stable position with a growing US company

- Direct collaboration with company leadership

- Opportunity to shape and own our entire social media strategy

- Room for professional growth as the company expands

- Paid Philippine holidays (negotiable)

- Performance-based salary increases



================================================================================

HOW TO APPLY

================================================================================



To apply, please send:



1. YOUR RESUME - highlighting relevant social media and marketing experience



2. PORTFOLIO - links to:

   - Social media accounts you've managed (or screenshots if confidential)

   - Examples of graphics/content you've created

   - Any campaign results or metrics you can share



3. COVER LETTER answering these questions:

   - Why are you interested in working with a B2B technology company?

   - What's one social media campaign you're proud of and why did it work?

   - What's your availability for US time zone overlap?

   - What is your expected salary within our range?



4. SHORT VIDEO (optional but highly recommended to get recognized):

   - 1-2 minute video introducing yourself

   - Tell us about your experience and why you'd be a great fit

   - This helps us see your communication style and personality



================================================================================

IMPORTANT NOTES

================================================================================



- Please include "SMM Specialist - [Your Name]" in your application subject line

- Applications without a portfolio will not be considered

- We will conduct a paid test task for shortlisted candidates

- We're looking to hire quickly but will take time to find the right person



We're excited to find someone who wants to grow with us. If you're strategic, creative, reliable, and ready to own this role—apply now!

title: YouTube Video Editor (Long-Term | Per-Video Pay | Real Estate Channel)
description:
Hi! I’m a Miami Florida USA-based real estate agent launching a new YouTube channel, and I’m looking for a dependable video editor I can grow with long-term. I’m looking for someone who understands YouTube pacing and clean storytelling, not flashy Instagram-style editing.



This is NOT a one-time project. I’m looking for someone consistent, communicative, and detail-oriented who enjoys working with talking-head content and helping videos feel clean, professional, and engaging.



What You’ll Be Editing

• Long-form YouTube videos (typically 8–15 minutes)

• Talking-head style content with educational storytelling

• Light b-roll added where appropriate

• Clean, simple editing style (not flashy or over-edited)

- 4 to 8 videos per month



Your Responsibilities

• Remove pauses, filler 
nts, and dead space

• Tighten pacing while keeping the natural feel

• Add basic b-roll to support what I’m saying

• Insert simple captions or text highlights when helpful

• Basic audio leveling and clean cuts

• Deliver a polished YouTube-ready video



Turnaround Time

• 3 business days per video



Payment

• Paid per completed video

• This will be ongoing work as the channel grows



Who This Is Perfect For

• Someone experienced with long-form YouTube editing

• Organized and responsive

• Comfortable working with a creator who gives feedback and evolves over time

• Interested in building a long-term working relationship



Bonus (Not Required)

• Experience editing educational or real estate content

• Understanding of YouTube pacing and viewer retention



To apply, please send:



- Links to 2–3 long-form videos you’ve edited

- What software you use

- Your typical turnaround time

- Your rate per video

- The word “COFFEE” in your application so I know you read this ????



Looking forward to finding the right person to grow with!

title: Bookkeeper / Accountant (Full-Time, Remote)
description:

title: HR Assistant / Accounts Payable & Accounts Receivable Specialist
description:
The HR Assistant / AP & AR Specialist provides administrative support to Human Resources while managing day-to-day financial transactions related to accounts payable and accounts receivable. This role ensures accurate employee records, timely vendor payments, efficient billing processes, and compliance with company policies within a fast-paced telecommunications environment.



Key Responsibilities:



Human Resources Support



- Assist with recruitment activities including job postings, applicant screening, interview coordination, and onboarding.

- Maintain employee records, HR databases, and personnel files in compliance with company policies.

- Support new hire onboarding and offboarding processes.

- Monitor employee attendance, leave tracking, and HR documentation.

- Assist with payroll preparation by providing employee data and updates.

- Coordinate employee communications, training schedules, and HR initiatives.

- Ensure confidentiality of employee information at all times.

- Support compliance with labor laws and internal HR policies.



Accounts Payable (AP) Responsibilities



- Process vendor invoices accurately and in a timely manner.

- Verify invoices, purchase orders, and approvals prior to payment.

- Prepare payment schedules including ACH, wire transfers, and checks.

- Maintain vendor records and updated banking information.

- Reconcile vendor statements and resolve billing discrepancies.

- Track expenses and ensure proper cost allocation.

- Assist with month-end closing and financial reporting.



Accounts Receivable (AR) Responsibilities

- Generate and issue customer invoices for telecom services and products.

- Monitor accounts to ensure timely payments.

- Follow up on outstanding balances and past-due invoices.

- Post customer payments and maintain accurate records.

- Reconcile customer accounts and resolve payment disputes.

- Prepare AR aging reports and collection summaries.

- Coordinate with customer service and sales teams regarding billing concerns.



Qualifications



- Bachelor’s degree in Human Resources, Accounting, Business Administration, or related field preferred.

- Minimum 4 years of experience in HR administration, AP/AR, or accounting support.

- Experience in telecommunications, technology, or service-based industries preferred.

- Knowledge of payroll support, billing systems, and accounting principles.

- Proficiency in Microsoft Office Suite (Excel, Word, Outlook).

- Experience with accounting software (QuickBooks)

- Strong organizational and multitasking skills.

- Excellent communication and interpersonal abilities.

- High level of accuracy and attention to detail.

title: Expert Web Designer & Graphic Designer (Contract to Part-Time)
description:
1st Optimal is a high-performance health brand that empowers high-achieving adults to optimize their health, energy, and longevity through personalized functional medicine and coaching. We offer cutting-edge services in hormone optimization, weight management, and wellness through a holistic, science-backed approach. Our goal is to transform lives with functional health insights and high-end, personalized solutions. We are looking to enhance our online presence and are seeking a highly skilled and creative web and graphic designer to join our team.



Position Overview:

We are looking for an experienced Web Designer and Graphic Designer with technical, visual, and user-centric expertise to help elevate our digital brand. You’ll be responsible for creating visually engaging websites, landing pages, and promotional assets on our WordPress site using Divi Builder. Bonus if you have Shopify theme design experience! This role is contract-to-part-time with flexible working hours.



Key Responsibilities:

- Design, develop, and maintain the 1st Optimal website on WordPress using Divi Builder, ensuring functionality, accessibility, and aesthetic appeal across all devices (mobile, tablet, desktop).

- Apply your proficiency in HTML/CSS to create, style, and lay out web pages while considering user experience (UI/UX) design principles.

- Collaborate with content and marketing teams to create custom, branded graphics, banners, and digital assets for various channels (website, social media,
 campaigns, etc.).

- Use tools like Figma, Adobe XD, or Sketch to create mockups, prototypes, and high-fidelity designs for both web and mobile interfaces.

- Ensure websites meet accessibility standards (WCAG) to create an inclusive experience for all users.

- Design with conversion in mind, ensuring user journeys are optimized and clear calls-to-action (CTAs) are strategically placed.

- Customize and design Shopify themes and e-commerce store elements (bonus if you have experience in this!).

- Manage multiple projects with efficiency and precision, meeting deadlines and maintaining quality.

- Continuously update website content and design in line with new branding guidelines, promotions, or products.

- Maintain clear communication and regular updates with tea
mbers and stakeholders to manage design iterations and timelines.



Requirements:

- Proven experience in web design with expertise in WordPress and Divi Builder.

- Proficiency in HTML, CSS, and basic JavaScript to create interactive elements.

- Strong understanding of UI/UX design principles, including visual hierarchy, layout grids, typography, and color theory.

- Experience creating responsive websites that work seamlessly across mobile, tablet, and desktop devices.

- Knowledge of accessibility standards (WCAG) to ensure an inclusive web experience.

- Mastery of design tools like Figma, Adobe XD, or Sketch for creating mockups and prototypes.

- Experience with Shopify theme design (bonus if you have this skill!).

- Solid understanding of basic SEO principles to enhance website search visibility.

- Excellent project management and organizational skills to manage multiple design projects simultaneously.

- Strong communication and collaboration skills to work effectively with cross-functional teams and stakeholders.

- A problem-solving mindset with the ability to translate user needs and business goals into technical design solutions.



Bonus Skills:

- Knowledge of conversion optimization, focusing on user experience and user journeys.

- Experience designing marketing assets for social media,
 newsletters, and digital campaigns.

- Familiarity with website optimization tools like Google Analytics, page speed optimization, etc.

- Ability to work independently, take initiative, and self-manage with minimal supervision.



How to Apply:

Please send your resume, portfolio (with web design and graphic design examples), and a brief cover letter outlining why you would be a great fit for this role. We’re excited to see your creative work and how you can help us elevate our brand online!

title: Customer Service Representative
description:
Customer Service Representative - Field Office Liaison



About AppAid

AppAid is a dedicated Social Security advocacy group committed to assisting individuals with disabilities who are unable to work full-time. Our mission is to guide and support clients through the Social Security Disability Insurance (SSDI) and Supplemental Security Income (SSI) application and claims process, ensuring they receive the benefits they deserve.



As our company continues to grow, we are building a long-term talent pipeline. This entry-level role is designed for individuals who will start in applications and customer service and grow into a Case Manager role, with clearly defined tiers and increasing responsibility over time.



Qualifications:

Bachelor’s degree or equivalent relevant experience preferred.

Prior experience working with or for the Social Security Administration is highly preferred.

Strong and clear communication skills with the ability to explain complex information clearly and empathetically.

Excellent organization, attention to detail, and time-management skills.

Ability to multitask and prioritize in a fast-paced environment.

Proficiency with Microsoft Office and related software tools.

Strong problem-solving skills and professionalism.

High level of integrity and commitment to ethical standards.



Key Responsibilities:

Call SSA Field Offices to:

Confirm AppAid’s representation status on client cases

Verify whether documents (applications, forms, medical records, etc.) were received

Follow up on outstanding or missing items requested by SSA

Request and document claim status updates (Title II and Title XVI)

Follow specific instructions provided by assigned Case Managers, including targeted follow-ups, verification requests, and documentation priorities

Accurately document all SSA interactions in Salesforce and related systems, including:

Field office contacted

SSA agent name

Information provided and next steps

Identify discrepancies or issues (e.g., missing forms, unestablished applications, incorrect representation) and escalate them to the assigned Case Manager or Team Lead

Track follow-ups and ensure timely callbacks or re-contacts with SSA as needed

Adhere to SSA communication protocols and AppAid documentation standards

Maintain professionalism and clarity when communicating with government offices

Support the Case Management team by reducing administrative and follow-up workload



Required Equipment (Must Have Your Own):

Windows:

Minimum Intel i5 processor

128GB SSD

16GB RAM

Windows 10

Mac:

Apple M2 chip or newer

256GB SSD

16GB RAM

Backup power station

Reliable internet connection with ethernet connection 

Reliable backup internet connection



Compensation & Growth:

This position serves as the primary entry point into the Case Management department and is designed to develop foundational SSA knowledge, documentation accuracy, and client advocacy skills. High performers in this role will be considered for promotion into a Case Manager position.

Starting pay & rates to be discussed upon interview. 

This position does not include benefits.



Schedule:

8-hour shift: 6:00 AM – 3:00 PM PST

1-hour unpaid lunch (required for all contractors)

title: Guest Posting & Blogger Outreach Specialist
description:
The Guest Posting & Blogger Outreach Specialist is responsible for building high-quality backlinks and increasing brand visibility through strategic outreach, relationship building, and content placement on reputable blogs, media platforms, and industry websites. This role plays a key part in improving SEO performance, domain authority, and online presence.



Key Responsibilities: 



Blogger Outreach & Relationship Management



- Identify and research relevant bloggers, publishers, influencers, and website owners within target industries.

- Conduct outreach campaigns via
 and social platforms to secure guest posting opportunities.

- Build and maintain long-term relationships with blog owners and digital publishers.

- Negotiate guest post placements, collaborations, and content partnerships.

- Maintain an organized outreach database and contact lists.



Guest Posting & Link Building



- Secure high-quality guest post placements on authoritative websites.

- Coordinate with content writers to ensure articles meet publisher guidelines.

- Ensure backlinks meet SEO best practices and company standards.

- Monitor live links and verify successful publication.

- Track link-building performance and domain authority improvements.



Content Coordination



- Develop guest post topics aligned with SEO strategy and brand messaging.

- Review content to ensure quality, originality, and relevance.

- Collaborate with SEO and marketing teams on keyword targeting.

- Ensure anchor text distribution follows SEO guidelines.



SEO & Reporting



- Perform competitor backlink analysis.

- Track outreach success rates and campaign performance.

- Prepare weekly or monthly outreach and backlink reports.

- Use SEO tools to evaluate website authority and link quality.



Qualifications



- Bachelor’s degree in Marketing, Communications, Journalism, or related field preferred.

- 2+ years experience in guest posting, link building, or blogger outreach.

- Strong understanding of SEO and off-page optimization strategies.

- Excellent written communication and
 outreach skills.

- Strong research and negotiation skills.

- Detail-oriented with strong organizational abilities.



Preferred Skills: 



- Experience in telecommunications, technology, SaaS, or digital marketing industries.

- Knowledge of content marketing and digital PR strategies.

- Familiarity with WordPress and publishing platforms.

- Understanding of Google search guidelines and white-hat SEO practices.



Key Performance Indicators (KPIs): 



- Number of successful guest post placements per month

- Quality of backlinks (Domain Authority / Domain Rating)

- Outreach response rate

- Increase in organic traffic and keyword rankings

- Link retention rate



Note: Attached PDF copy of your CV and sample work in your application. 

Thank you

title: Virtual Assistant – Amazon OA Product Sourcing
description:
???? NOW HIRING

Virtual Assistant – Amazon OA Product Sourcing

Remote | Part-Time or Full-Time | Entry to Intermediate Level



ABOUT US

We are a fast-growing, multi-million dollar Amazon third-party selling operation with a proven track record and an expanding catalog. We take pride in our systematic, data-driven approach to sourcing and our commitment to building a world-class remote team. We are not looking for someone to coast — we are looking for someone ready to grow with us.



ROLE OVERVIEW

We are seeking a motivated, detail-oriented Virtual Assistant to join our Online Arbitrage (OA) sourcing team. Your primary responsibility will be to identify profitable product opportunities for resale on Amazon using industry-standard tools and strict criteria provided by our team. This is a high-accountability role that rewards consistency, accuracy, and a willingness to learn.



KEY RESPONSIBILITIES

• Source profitable OA leads using Keepa, Seller AMP, and other approved tools

• Analyze sales rank history, price trends, buy box behavior, and competition data

• Evaluate ROI, estimated monthly sales, and competition levels against our sourcing criteria

• Submit leads through our internal tracking system with complete data documentation

• Maintain a consistent daily lead quota as outlined during training

• Communicate clearly and promptly with team leads regarding sourcing findings

• Complete our mandatory 2-week training course before independent sourcing begins

• Stay up-to-date on Amazon policy changes that may affect sourcing decisions



REQUIRED TOOLS & KNOWLEDGE

You Must Have Experience With (or Be Willing to Learn):

• Keepa – understanding sales rank history, price history, buy box trends, and offer count tracking

• Seller AMP (SAS) – using the Chrome extension for quick ASIN analysis, ROI calculation, and eligibility checks

• Basic understanding of Amazon FBA, Buy Box mechanics, and how IP complaints or hazmat flags can disqualify leads

• Google Sheets or Excel – for data entry and lead documentation

• Reliable internet connection and a computer capable of running browser extensions smoothly

Nice to Have (Bonus Skills):

• Familiarity with Tactical Arbitrage, BrickSeek, or similar sourcing platforms

• Understanding of ungating and restricted category navigation

• Experience working within a VA team structure or with SOPs



MANDATORY 2-WEEK TRAINING PROGRAM

ALL new hires are required to complete our structured onboarding and training program before sourcing independently. This is non-negotiable.



During your training you will:

• Learn our exact sourcing criteria and how to apply it using Keepa and Seller AMP

• Understand what makes a lead acceptable vs. disqualifying

• Practice submitting leads in our internal system with proper formatting

• Receive direct feedback from our team leads on your submitted practice leads

• Be assessed for readiness before transitioning to live sourcing



We invest in our team. This training is designed to set you up for success from day one.



ZERO TOLERANCE LEAD POLICY

? Submitting leads sourced from shared lead lists, paid lead groups,
 lead groups, or any third-party shared lead service is STRICTLY PROHIBITED and is grounds for IMMEDIATE termination without appeal.



Every lead submitted must be independently sourced by you using approved methods. We run verification checks. Leads that appear on publicly shared lists will be flagged immediately. We take lead integrity extremely seriously — it is the foundation of our competitive edge.



WHAT WE OFFER

• Competitive pay (rate discussed during interview, based on experience and output)

• Flexible, remote work schedule — work from anywhere

• A structured, supportive onboarding experience with real feedback

• A clear path for growth within our expanding operation

• Performance-based bonuses for consistent, high-quality lead submission

• A stable, long-term position with a serious, professional team



WHO WE ARE LOOKING FOR

We are not necessarily looking for the most experienced VA. We are looking for the RIGHT person. That means someone who is:



• Trainable and coachable — willing to follow systems without cutting corners

• Detail-oriented — small mistakes in OA sourcing cost real money

• Self-motivated — able to hit daily targets without being micromanaged

• Honest and transparent — we have a zero-tolerance policy for dishonesty

• Reliable — showing up consistently, meeting deadlines, and communicating proactively

• Growth-minded — we want people who want to be part of something bigger



AUTOMATIC DISQUALIFIERS

? Do NOT apply if you source from or intend to use shared lead lists or lead groups.

? Do NOT apply if you are not willing to complete the 2-week training program.

? Do NOT apply if you cannot commit to consistent daily output.

? Do NOT apply if you are not open to following strict sourcing criteria and SOPs.



HOW TO APPLY

To be considered, please submit the following:



• A brief introduction about yourself and your background

• Your experience level with Keepa and Seller AMP (beginner / intermediate / advanced)

• Your availability (hours per day / days per week)

• Your desired pay rate or range

• One example of a sourcing decision you've made (even hypothetical is fine for beginners)

• 3 sample leads sourced within the last 7 days — include the ASIN, source store/URL, buy cost, Amazon selling price, estimated ROI, and a Keepa screenshot or link for each



Applications that do not include all of the above will not be reviewed.



We look forward to finding our next great tea
mber. If you are hungry, honest, and ready to learn — we want to hear from you.



This position is remote. Serious inquiries only.

title: Scheduler (Healthcare Industry)
description:
Charm is a GTM agency that works with clients in numerous industries and assists them by building and managing Customer Service, Sales, and Marketing teams. With more than 5 years of experience, Charm has established itself as an essential element of over 100 unique companies. We have a client in Healthcare that we're looking to hire for.



Overview

We are seeking a detail-oriented Healthcare Scheduler to manage and optimize schedules for

clinical services delivered in school-based and community settings. This role directly supports

service utilization, provider productivity, and revenue by ensuring sessions are scheduled

accurately, consistently, and in alignment with service requirements. The Scheduler works

closely with clinical, operations, and administrative teams to maintain efficient and compliant

schedules.



Key Responsibilities

? Build, maintain, and manage schedules for healthcare providers across school-based

and non-school-based settings

? Coordinate provider availability, school schedules, and service requirements to maximize

utilization

? Manage cancellations, reschedules, and coverage changes while minimizing lost

sessions

? Ensure scheduled services align with authorizations, service frequency, and delivery

guidelines

? Monitor schedules for gaps, conflicts, and underutilization and take corrective action

? Communicate schedule updates clearly with providers, school contacts, and internal

teams

? Maintain accurate documentation in scheduling and clinical systems

? Support revenue integrity by ensuring services are scheduled in a way that can be

delivered, documented, and billed

? Identify recurring scheduling issues and escalate risks impacting utilization or revenue



Required Skills and Experience



? Experience with Google Sheets or Microsoft Excel functions such as filters, sorting, and

basic formulas.

? 2+ years of scheduling or care coordination experience, preferably in healthcare

? Strong attention to detail and ability to manage complex, high-volume schedules

? Comfort working with scheduling systems, EHRs, and internal tools

? Clear written and verbal communication skills with clinical and non-clinical stakeholders

? Ability to prioritize tasks and adapt quickly in a changing environment



Preferred Qualifications

? Experience with school-based services, behavioral health, or therapy scheduling

? Familiarity with authorizations, service frequency requirements, and clinical workflows

? Understanding of how scheduling impacts utilization, documentation, and billing



Working Style and Expectations

? Operates with a high level of accuracy and accountability

? Proactively identifies scheduling gaps and utilization risks

? Balances speed with precision in a fast-paced healthcare environment

? Handles sensitive information in compliance with HIPAA and organizational standards

, or AI platforms

mbers as the team grows

title: Youtube Video Editor
description:
ROLE 



As a Video Editor, your primary role is to edit and optimize long-form and short-form video content for our clients’ YouTube channels. 



This includes transforming raw footage (Zoom recordings, talking-head videos, podcasts, webinars, screen shares) into polished, engaging YouTube videos and supporting clips that reflect each client’s brand, voice, and goals.



You will work closely with our internal team to ensure videos are edited accurately, on-brand, and delivered on time. 



Brand guidelines, references, and direction will be provided and templatized across all edits, which will help you with speed and quality of execution.  You are expected to bring strong editorial judgment, storytelling instincts, and attention to detail to every project.



This is not just a technical editing role. You are helping our clients show up professionally, build authority, and grow their audience on YouTube.



RESPONSIBILITIES



-Edit long-form YouTube videos (approx 20 minutes) from raw footage into clear, engaging, professional final cuts



-Remove filler, tighten pacing, and enhance clarity while preserving the client’s voice and message



-Add on-screen text, light motion graphics, b-roll, screen recordings, and music where appropriate



-Create short clips from long-form videos for YouTube Shorts and other platforms when requested



-Ensure correct formatting, resolution, audio levels, captions, and thumbnails (when applicable)



-Follow client-specific brand guidelines, templates, and stylistic preferences



-Implement feedback accurately and efficiently with minimal revisions



-Manage multiple client projects simultaneously while meeting deadlines



-Communicate clearly with the internal team regarding timelines, capacity, and priorities (our Social Media Manager will be the liaison who communicates directly to clients)



-Flag issues proactively (missing files, unclear direction, unrealistic timelines)



-Maintain organized project files and workflows using shared tools



Your role isn’t just to edit — it’s to make our clients look credible, confident, and worth listening to.





RESULTS



-Client YouTube videos are delivered on time and meet quality standards



-Videos are edited within approximately 5 hours per video



-Estimated output of 6 x 12-18 minute videos every 4 days



-Videos are clean, well-paced, and easy to follow



-Each video reflects the client’s tone, brand, and positioning



-Revisions are minimal once rhythm and expectations are established



-Communication is clear, professional, and reliable



-You can estimate turnaround times accurately and flag overload early



-Clients and internal team trust your consistency and judgment



REQUIREMENTS



-Excellent written & spoken English communication skills  (English does not need to be your first language, but clarity and professionalism are essential)



-2+ years of experience editing video content (YouTube experience strongly preferred)



-Strong storytelling and pacing instincts



-High attention to detail — audio, visuals, captions, formatting



-Ability to follow processes, templates, and brand standards consistently



-Comfortable working with repetitive workflows across multiple clients



-Organized, reliable, and deadline-driven



-The secret code is HP2026



-Able to receive and apply feedback without defensiveness



-Calm under pressure and able to manage multiple priorities



-Strong aesthetic judgment and restraint (knowing when not to over-edit)



-Working knowledge of tools such as:



>Adobe Premiere Pro / Final Cut / DaVinci Resolve

>Slack

>Google Drive / Dropbox

>Project management tools (Asana, ClickUp, etc.)



-Understanding of how music, pacing, and visuals influence viewer emotion and retention



ABOUT HEALTHPRENEUR 



Healthpreneur® is the industry-leading coaching and training company for health practitioners and coaches who want to get more clients and scale their businesses.



The company was founded in 2015 and is led by Yuri Elkaim - a NYT bestselling author, sought-after speaker and business coach, and CEO of a previous multiple 7-figure online health business that he started in 2006.



Our mission is to transform the health and lives of 1 BILLION people on the planet by 2040 by helping health experts build better businesses and become more impactful within their respective markets.



...



**This is a long-term, full-time role working with multiple clients.  Reliability, communication, and consistency matter as much as editing skill.**



TO APPLY: Go to 
=



*Note - we are VERY selective about who we work with.  You will be asked to submit a video cover letter in order for us to review your resume and consider next steps.*

title: Cybersecurity Engineer (Full-Time, Remote)
description:
We are seeking a skilled and motivated Cybersecurity Engineer to join our team. As a Cybersecurity Engineer, you will play a critical role in protecting our clients’ IT environments by identifying vulnerabilities, implementing security measures, and responding to potential threats.



This is an exciting opportunity to work in a dynamic and collaborative environment, where you’ll help safeguard businesses from cyber risks while growing your expertise in the ever-evolving field of cybersecurity.



Key Responsibilities

* Design, implement, and maintain security solutions to protect IT systems and data.

* Develop and enforce security policies, procedures, and best practices.

* Analyze security alerts, logs, and i
 to identify potential threats.

* Conduct vulnerability assessments to identify and mitigate risks.

* Respond to and investigate security i
, providing detailed reports and recommendations.

* Collaborate with IT teams to ensure systems are configured securely.

* Stay up-to-date with the latest cybersecurity trends, threats, and technologies.

* Provide training and guidance to tea
mbers and clients on cybersecurity best practices.



Technologies You’ll Work With

* Endpoint protection and monitoring tools.

* Firewalls, VPNs, and intrusion detection/prevention systems.

* Cloud security tools for Microsoft 365, Azure, and AWS.

* SIEM platforms.

* Vulnerability scanning tools (e.g., Nessus, Qualys).



What We’re Looking For

* Strong understanding of network security and firewalls.

* Familiarity with vulnerability assessments and i
 response.

* Knowledge of security frameworks and standards (e.g., NIST, ISO 27001, CIS).

* Excellent problem-solving and analytical skills.

* Strong communication skills and the ability to explain technical concepts to non-technical audiences.



Preferred but Not Required:

* Certifications such as CISSP, CEH, CompTIA Security+, or CISM.

* Experience with cloud security (Microsoft 365, Azure, AWS).

* Experience in cybersecurity or a related IT field (2+ years preferred).



Why Join Us?

* Be part of a forward-thinking team dedicated to protecting businesses from cyber threats.

* Opportunities for professional growth and paid certifications.

* Competitive salary and performance-based incentives.

* Monthly healthcare allowance.

* 13th-month pay.

title: Portfolio Manager – Short-Term Rentals

Contribute ideas to scale operations efficiently

Monitor feedback and implement corrective actions

Flexible work structure



Access to industry-leading tools and training

title: Marketing assistant
description:
We are a commercial real estate brokerage firm that specializes in investment sales nationwide. Our team prepares detailed valuation proposals and marketing packages for clients that include lease analysis, location research, and comparable sales data.



We are looking to hire a full-time Marketing Assistant to help with the creation and organization of these proposals.



Responsibilities:

Review and summarize lease terms, rent schedules, and option structures



Build retailer and trade-area maps



Research and input comparable sales from our internal database and industry platforms



Maintain organized Excel spreadsheets for pricing and financial analysis



Ensure proposals are accurate, clean, and professionally formatted



Qualifications:



Strong proficiency in Microsoft Excel and PowerPoint



Formal education in Mathematics, Engineering, Finance, Economics, or another science-based field



Comfortable working with numbers, percentages, and financial calculations



Detail-oriented and highly organized

We are looking for someone dedicated, committed to growth, and interested in building long-term experience within commercial real estate.

title: Virtual Assistant - AI Startup
description:
We are hiring a high-agency virtual assistant to run day-to-day operations across admin, accounting support, workflow automation, AI operations, social media execution, and affiliate outreach.



## Core Responsibilities

1. Executive/admin support: inbox triage, calendar management, meeting notes, action tracking, and SOP documentation.

2. Accounting support: invoice prep, expense tracking, payment follow-up, contractor payout prep, and monthly reporting handoff.

3. Workflow operations: build and maintain automations (Zapier/Make/n8n), document workflows, monitor failures, and resolve broken steps.

4. AI operations: run AI-assisted workflows, maintain prompts/templates, quality-check outputs, and flag low-quality results.

5. Social media operations: content scheduling, post repurposing, publishing cadence, comment triage, and weekly performance summaries.

6. Affiliate operations: prospecting, outreach, follow-up sequencing, onboarding support, and affiliate tracker maintenance.

7. Research and execution support: vendor comparisons, tool setup, process improvements, and ad hoc founder support tasks.



## Additional Scope Over Time

1. Creator/influencer outreach support.

2. Basic customer support queue triage.

3. Internal QA and release checklist coordination.

4. Knowledge base and internal process wiki maintenance.

5. Hiring coordination and candidate ops support.



## Interview Process

1. Stage 1: Written screening responses to the questions below.

2. Stage 2: 20-minute intro call (communication + ownership + execution style).

3. Stage 3: Paid real-world simulation task (operations + automation + communication).

4. Final stage: Fit/alignment call and role scope confirmation.



## Interview Prompt

Before interviews, please answer briefly (bullets ok, max ~5 lines each):



1. Portfolio/LinkedIn + 1-2 examples of operations, VA, or executive support work you handled directly.

2. Describe one complex workflow you built (automation or manual). What tools did you use, and what problem did it solve?

3. Describe one AI-assisted workflow you run today. How do you quality-check outputs before final delivery?

4. Describe your accounting support experience (invoices, expense tracking, payment follow-ups, monthly close prep, etc.).

5. Describe a social media workflow you managed end-to-end (planning, scheduling, posting, reporting).

6. Describe an affiliate or outreach process you managed (prospecting, outreach cadence, follow-up, tracking results).

7. You receive an unclear task with missing context and a tight deadline. What is your process from first message to final delivery?

8. Timezone, weekly availability, expected response times, and hourly/fixed rate.

title: Expert Content Manager (AI-Powered Marketing)
description:
Expert Content Manager (AI-Powered Marketing)



About Mortgage Hackers

Mortgage Hackers is an innovative, AI-solutions-driven specialist finance brokerage in Australia, helping everyone from first-home buyers to seasoned property developers build the future. We're sharp, fast, and looking for a content genius to tell our story.



The Role

As our Content Manager, you will be the engine of our lead generation system. This is a hands-on role where you will be responsible for the end-to-end execution of our content strategy, using our suite of AI tools to create high-quality content at scale.



Key Responsibilities

1. Content & Production

• AI-Powered Video Creation: Use our high-quality AI avatar technology to create and edit all video content, including our monthly YouTube podcast, social media clips, and video ads.

• Content Repurposing: Repurpose our monthly YouTube podcast into 40-60 short-form videos for social media, plus engaging social posts and LinkedIn articles.

• Ad Creative Development: Design and produce a range of ad creatives, including engaging videos and static images for our paid campaigns.



2. Marketing & Growth

• Social Media Management: Execute a high-velocity daily posting schedule across
, Instagram, TikTok, and YouTube Shorts.

• Full-Funnel Meta Ads: Manage our Meta Ads 
 & Instagram) campaigns from start to finish. This includes building conversion funnels, creating lead forms, and developing interactive quizzes to capture leads.

• Webinar Execution: Run our key monthly lead generation event—a pre-recorded webinar. You will manage the setup, promotion, and live chat during the event.



3. Operations & Analytics

• Content Scheduling: Own the content calendar and use scheduling tools (like Later or Buffer) to batch-schedule all weekly content.

• Performance Reporting: Track and analyze content performance every Friday, reporting on key metrics like leads, CPL, and top-performing content.



What We're Looking For

• Proven Experience as a Content Manager or Social Media Manager.

• Exceptional English writing and editing skills, with a portfolio to prove it.

• Financial Marketing Acumen: A demonstrated understanding of how to market financial products effectively and responsibly.

• Compliance Awareness: Knowledge of marketing compliance standards within the Australian financial industry is a huge plus.

• Tech-Savvy & Independent: You are reliable, detail-oriented, and comfortable working with new technologies.



What We Offer

• Competitive Salary: 50,000 PHP per month.

• Fully Remote: A flexible, work-from-home environment.

• Growth Opportunity: Be a key part of a growing international brand.

• Stability: A long-term, stable position.



To show you've read this, please include the word "Hacker" in the first sentence of your application.

title: Lead Data Analyst, Returns and Credits
description:
We are looking for a highly technical and analytical Lead Analyst to own the data integrity of our returns and credits department. Your primary goal is ensuring that our refunds and credits are reported accurately, formatted correctly, and tracked meticulously.



Key Responsibilities:



Data Integrity & Auditing: Monitor the full lifecycle of refunds and credits. Ensure all data is updated, formatted correctly, and reported without errors.



SLA Tracking & Vendor Accountability: Build and maintain tracking systems for vendor performance. You will ensure we know exactly which refunds, credits, and returns are on time and which are pending.



Workflow Assignment: Generate daily reports that serve as the "action plan" for the Returns Coordinator and Credits Coordinator. You will assign specific tasks to them to clear backlogs and fix discrepancies.



Scripting & Automation: Utilize scripts (Python, VBA, or AI-generated code) to clean messy data, run complex audits, and automate manual reporting processes.



Financial Reconciliation: Work with accounting values to ensure that what is in our system matches the financial reality of our bank/credit memos.



The Ideal Candidate:



Analytical & Technical: You spend 95% of your time in the data. You are an expert in Excel and comfortable using scripts to manipulate large datasets.



Detail-Obsessed: You spot formatting errors and missing values immediately.



Directive: You are comfortable handing off work to tea
mbers and following up to ensure it was done correctly.



Resourceful: You know how to use tools (including AI) to write the scripts or formulas needed to get the job done efficiently.



Requirements:



High-level proficiency in Excel (complex formulas, PivotTables, VBA/Macros).



Experience with scripting/automation (using Python, SQL, or similar to process data). Using AI to create scripts is acceptable.  We DO NOT expect this individual to know how to code, or create scripts on their own, however to leverage AI and understand the tools to run it.



Background in working with financial data, accounting values, or inventory reconciliation.



Proven ability to organize workflows and track SLAs.



Send in you CV or a link to a shared file with necessary access granted. 

No CV will be automatically ignored.

title: Customer Service Representative/Manager
description:
About Us:



We are a fast-growing e-commerce company operating multiple online stores across different niches — currently fashion and home decor/lighting, with more on the way. We are scaling quickly and expanding our team to match.

This is not a typical CS job. We are looking for someone who starts as a Customer Service Representative but is being hired with the explicit intention of growing into a Customer Service Manager — someone who will eventually own the entire CS function, hire their own team, and manage reps across multiple stores.

If you want a job where you answer
s and clock out, this is not for you. If you want to grow fast, take on real responsibility, and be part of building something from the ground up — read on.



The Role

You will start as a CS Representative handling customer
s across our stores. As you demonstrate competence, reliability, and leadership, you will take on increasing responsibility until you are running the CS department yourself.



Phase 1 — CS Representative



Handle all inbound customer service
s across multiple e-commerce stores

Resolve customer issues including returns, refunds, damaged items, order inquiries, and complaints — following our detailed SOPs for each niche

Maintain fast response times (target: under 4 hours during business hours)

Escalate complex cases to management with clear notes

Learn our products, policies, and resolution procedures inside out



Phase 2 — CS Manager (earned through performance)



Hire, train, and manage additional CS representatives as the team scales

Own quality control — review rep responses, identify gaps, improve processes

Refine and update SOPs as new stores and niches are added

Report on CS performance metrics to company leadership

Be the first point of escalation before issues reach management





What You Need to Succeed

Required:



At least 1 year of customer service experience, preferably in e-commerce

Excellent written English — professional, clear, and empathetic

Comfortable handling upset or frustrated customers calmly and confidently

Strong attention to detail — you will be following specific SOPs and every step matters

Reliable internet connection and availability during US business hours

Self-starter who can work independently without constant supervision



Big plus if you have:



Experience in e-commerce customer service (returns, refunds, disputes)

Experience with Shopify, Gorgias, Zendesk, or similar helpdesk tools

Any prior experience training or supervising others

Familiarity with handling international shipping or dropshipping complaints





What Makes This Different

Most CS jobs are dead ends. This one has a clear and fast path upward.

We are a growing company that needs leaders, not just ticket-closers. You will be trained on exactly how we handle every type of customer situation across every store we run. Once you know the business inside out, the next step is managing others doing the same thing — and you will be compensated significantly more when you get there.

We move fast. If you perform, you will not be waiting 3 years for a promotion.



Compensation



Starting: $5–$10/day depending on experience

Increase: Fast and significant as you prove yourself and take on more responsibility

Manager level: Considerably higher — this will be discussed as you progress



We are transparent: the starting rate reflects an entry-level beginning with a small team. The growth potential and salary increase are real, not a promise we use to fill a seat. We are looking for someone who values trajectory over starting pay. 



*As our business grows, we increase the pay heavily.



How to Apply

To be considered, please send:



A short introduction — who you are, what type of work experience you have, and why this role interests you

An example of how you would respond to this customer
 (write it out in full):





"I ordered a lamp 3 weeks ago and it looks completely different from the photos. The color is way off and I want a full refund. I'm going to leave a bad review everywhere if this isn't resolved today."





Your availability — confirm you can work business hours and list any blackout dates in the next 30 days



Applications without the example response will not be reviewed. This is intentional — we want to see how you think and write before anything else.

description:
Hybrid Transaction Coordinator / Real Estate

Operations Assistant

Full-Time | Remote or Local | Pennsylvania Real Estate Experience Required

Position Overview

I am seeking a highly organized, detail-oriented "Hybrid" Transaction Coordinator (TC) / Virtual

Assistant (VA) to support a top-producing real estate agent based in Erie, Pennsylvania. This role

will manage transactions from contract to close, assist with CRM organization, support compliance

documentation, and help streamline systems and software. The ideal candidate has prior

experience supporting real estate agents and understands Pennsylvania real estate contracts and

timelines. This is a full-time position with flexibility, but weekend availability (as needed) is

preferred.

Transaction Coordination (Start-to-Finish)

• Manage transactions from executed agreement to closing

• Prepare and send documents for signatures (ZipForms is current system)

• Monitor contingency deadlines (inspections, mortgage, appraisal, etc.)

• Communicate with lenders, title companies, co-op agents, and clients

• Ensure all documents are properly signed and uploaded for brokerage compliance

• Track appraisal gaps, addenda, amendments, and extensions

• Prepare listing paperwork and input into MLS (if applicable)

• Coordinate closing logistics if/when needed

Compliance & Documentation

• Obtain missing signatures and required documents

• Ensure files meet brokerage compliance requirements

Maintain organized digital file systems

• Upload documents to brokerage platforms

• Track required disclosures and timelines

CRM & Systems Management

• Manage and organize Follow Up Boss CRM

• Input new contacts, tag properly, and assign action plans when needed

• Maintain database hygiene and organization

• Create simple workflows when needed

• Assist agent in learning efficiencies within Follow Up Boss

Software & Systems Support

• Follow Up Boss

• ZipForms (or similar platforms)

• Proficient with Google Workspace

• Canva (basic knowledge preferred)

• Third-party marketing platforms that integrate with Follow Up Boss and manage if implemented. Helping agent to determine if one is needed

• Ability to troubleshoot basic tech issues

• Recommend system improvements and workflow efficiencies

Light Marketing Support (Bonus, Not Primary)

• Basic social media scheduling 

• Upload listing posts

• Coordinate with marketing company

• Assist with simple graphics if needed

Required Qualifications

• Prior experience as a Transaction Coordinator or Real Estate VA

• Familiar with Pennsylvania real estate contracts and timelines (strongly preferred)

• Experience working with U.S.-based agents

• Strong written English and professional communication skills

• Excellent deadline management

• Comfortable working independently

• Tech-savvy and systems-minded

• Comfortable brainstorming with agent and making suggestions for program efficiency

title: Part-time Digital Content/SEO Specialist
description:
We are seeking a freelance Digital Marketing Specialist to support our execution team on a contract basis. This role focuses on content implementation, SEO optimization, and technical management of client assets.







Your Key Responsibilities



As a core member of our execution team, you will handle a diverse range of tasks designed to drive client growth.



Content Writing: Produce SEO-optimized blog posts, articles, and website copy aligned with client requirements.

SEO Execution: Perform keyword research and optimize on-page elements, including meta titles, descriptions, and headers.

Backlink Strategy: Research backlink opportunities, draft guest blog proposals, and create articles for link-building purposes.

WordPress Management: Upload, format, and publish content directly via client WordPress backends.

Google Ads Support: Assist in the setup, monitoring, and optimization of Google Search Ad campaigns.

Reporting: Track and report on key performance metrics, including content engagement and keyword rankings.





What We Need From You



Proven Experience: Minimum 1-2 years of hands-on experience in content writing, SEO, or digital marketing.

CMS Proficiency: Strong familiarity with WordPress is essential. You should be comfortable navigating the backend and formatting posts.

SEO Knowledge: A solid understanding of on-page SEO best practices and keyword research tools.

Google Ads Experience: Familiarity with Google Search Ads is a strong plus.

Excellent Communication: Native or near-native English writing skills with impeccable grammar and attention to detail. Cantonese proficiency is a bonus.

Self-Starter Mentality: Ability to work independently, manage your own time effectively, and meet strict deadlines without constant supervision.

title: B2B Cold Caller / Appointment Setter (Australian Hotel Campaign)
description:
About Us:

We are a leading technology provider in Australia. We help independent hotels upgrade their Wi-Fi, networks, and In-Room Entertainment (TVs) with zero upfront capital expenditure (CapEx).



The Role:

We are looking for an aggressive, confident, and highly articulate B2B Cold Caller / Appointment Setter. Your sole objective is to cold call Hotel General Managers in Australia, introduce our zero-CapEx solution, and book a 15-minute introductory strategy call on our Sales team's calendars.



We will provide:

The calling lists (Hotel names, numbers, and targets).

A proven, tested script and value proposition.

Access to our CRM and calendar booking systems.



Responsibilities:

-Make 60-80+ outbound cold calls per day to Australian hotels.

-Navigate gatekeepers (receptionists) to reach the General Manager.

-Pitch our high-value offer and handle basic objections.

-Book qualified appointments directly into our calendar system.

-Leave detailed notes in our CRM after every call.



Requirements:

-Outstanding English Communication: You must have a clear, neutral, or slightly Western/Australian accent. Hotel GMs will hang up if they feel they are talking to a generic overseas call center.

-B2B Sales Experience: You are not afraid of rejection and know how to speak to C-Level executives and business owners.

-Tech-Savvy: Comfortable using CRM systems, softphones, and calendar tools.

-Reliable Setup: High-speed internet, a quiet workspace, and a high-quality noise-canceling headset.



Compensation & Trial:

This role will begin as a 1-month paid trial to test your ability to book actual, qualified meetings. If successful, this will transition into a long-term, ongoing role. (Please state your required monthly or hourly rate in your proposal).



MANDATORY APPLICATION INSTRUCTIONS - READ CAREFULLY

We will not review any applications that do not include a voice sample. Please record yourself reading the following 2 sentences (or attach an audio file), and include the link at the top of your proposal:



"Hi John, it’s [Your Name] calling from [Company Name]. I know I’ve caught you out of the blue, but I’m calling because we recently helped another independent hotel completely upgrade their network and guest TVs with zero upfront CapEx, and I wanted to see if you’d be open to a quick 10-minute chat next week to see how the math works?"

title: Content Creator - Video Editor for YT Videos
description: My name is William and I live in Honolulu, Hawai'i. Have recently started a YouTube channel in the "Business" niche. The name of the YT channel is "Business Execution Central." I am wanting high quality 8:30 - 10:00 minute videos designed and created for this new YT channel. I will provide all the scripts….you take it from there with your professional creativity and complete each video and send it to me for review….you would also create the thumbnail as well. I will have a Dropbox folder set up for you to upload all your work....so my team can carefully review in case there are any revisions required....which I hope would be at a minimum, please.  All produced work needs to be at the highest possible professional level. No shortcuts. Nothing goofy on any level. Our YT audience will be brilliant professionals who are seeking advice and insight from a trusted source. That is us!  We already have 10 videos on our channel....and I can send you the link to our YT channel so you can see what we are doing. Some of the vids are ok....some better....and there are 4 that are really strong....so those 4 would be the standard we're aiming for.....and continue to get even better moving forward.  Right now I have 5 video editors....but would be interested in hiring a few more part time. But....I need you to be very, very solid with your talent and skill. I'm definitely not looking for beginners who need lots of hand-holding or managing.....I need people who know their stuff....and can deliver at the highest level....immediately. It would be my honor to have you on our "Business Execution Central" Team. I look forward to hearing from you as soon as possible. You could be making money beginning today....as long as you can perform as a video editor professional with impressive creative and genius ability.  Mahalo nui loa....from Hawai'i.....

title: AI-DRIVEN ORGANIC CONTENT CREATOR (SMM)
description:
Company: Beauty Sleep Club



Role Type: Full-Time Contractor (Remote)



Objective: Scale organic reach to 1M+ monthly views and drive profitable acquisition through high-volume, AI-enhanced short-form video.



THE CORE MISSION

You are a Creator First. You will architect a viral presence by combining raw creative intuition with a cutting-edge AI stack. Your goal is to dominate the "Beauty Sleep Ritual" conversation by producing a massive volume of luxury-minimalist content that converts.

KEY PERFORMANCE INDICATORS (KPIs)



Reach: Achieve and maintain 1,000,000+ views per month across TikTok and Instagram Reels.

Growth: Drive net positive follower growth of 500–2,000+ per month.

Volume: Maintain a strict daily output of 10 high-quality assets.

Sales: Generate consistent, trackable link clicks to our BOGO offer pages.

DAILY CONTENT TARGETS (70 PIECES PER WEEK)

To succeed in this role, you must utilize AI to hit the following daily output:



5x Reels / TikToks: High-reach viral hooks, educational sleep tips, and "Ritual" unboxings.

3x Carousels: Educational deep-dives and aesthetic mood boards designed for "Saves".

2x Image Posts: High-end, luxury-minimalist statics generated/enhanced via Higgsfield.

RESPONSIBILITIES



AI-Native Workflow: Use Higgsfield for premium static ads and motion assets.

Trend Hijacking: Use AI social listening to identify viral trends and "remix" them for Beauty Sleep Club within a 4-hour window.

Platform Mastery: Manage the full end-to-end process of scripting, filming, and AI-editing.

Scheduling: Use Metricool to schedule all 10 daily posts for peak engagement times in the US and AU markets.

Reporting: Track and report weekly on reach, engagement, and link-click conversion metrics.

REQUIRED SKILLS & TOOLS



The AI Stack: Mastery of Higgsfield, ChatGPT/Claude, and AI video editing (CapCut, Captions.ai, or similar).

The Social Stack: Expert-level knowledge of Metricool and Instagram/TikTok algorithms.

Creator Intuition: You know exactly why a video goes viral and how to replicate it.

Aesthetic Alignment: Ability to execute a Luxury Minimalist brand voice that justifies our premium price points.





HOW TO APPLY

Please submit your portfolio and a brief 60-second video explaining how you would use AI to scale Beauty Sleep Club to 1M views this month.

title: VA Virtual Assistant
description:
Virtual Assistant (Appointment Setting for Coaching Fitness Offer)



Remote · Full-Time



Role Overview

The Virtual Assistant (VA) will play a key role in supporting backend operations, appointment setting, and lead nurturing at Z Strength Nutrition. This role blends lead nurturing and communication with organizational and reporting support. The ideal candidate is high English-proficiency, detail-oriented, proactive, and excited to help bring structure to a fast-growing fitness and coaching brand.



We offer an online fitness coaching program for women and men aged 25+ lose 20-30 lbs, build muscle, train for marathons, ironman triathlons, and hyrox events, and improve their overall health.

* Organize and update backend systems (Google Drive, reports, SOPs)

Requirements

* Experience in lead generation, social media engagement, or client communications

Workload & Compensation

title: Video Editor (TV + Direct Response Ads | AI + B-roll + Voiceover)
description:
We are looking for a detail-oriented, organized, and proactive video editor to help us build and scale high-performance TV and digital ad campaigns in the insurance industry (Medicare, ACA, etc.).



This is not just basic video editing. You will be responsible for creating complete direct-response video ads from script to final output. You must be comfortable working in a fast-paced environment and producing multiple variations of ads for testing and optimization.



We will provide scripts and creative direction. Your role is to bring these ads to life using B-roll, AI voiceover, visuals, pacing, and strong storytelling.



This role is ideal for someone who wants to grow long-term with a performance marketing company.





Responsibilities



• Create full TV and digital video ad campaigns from provided scripts

• Source and organize high-quality B-roll footage

• Use AI voiceover tools (such as ElevenLabs or similar)

• Sync visuals, voiceover, music, and motion graphics

• Create multiple variations of ads for testing (different hooks, pacing, visuals, etc.)

• Ensure ads meet brand, compliance, and platform standards

• Organize video assets and versions in a structured system

• Maintain a clean and scalable workflow as ad volume increases

• Collaborate with our marketing and compliance teams

• Meet deadlines and communicate proactively





Required Skills



• Strong experience editing direct-response or performance marketing ads

• Experience creating full video ads (not just editing clips)

• Ability to source B-roll and build compelling visual storytelling

• Experience with AI voiceover tools

• Strong attention to detail and organization

• Fast turnaround time

• Ability to create variations and iterate quickly

• Strong communication and reliability





Preferred Experience



• TV advertising or OTT / CTV ads

• Healthcare, insurance, or regulated industries

• Medicare or financial services marketing

• Experience with compliance-sensitive creatives

• Motion graphics and simple animation

• Experience testing ad variations and improving performance



?



Important



We are looking for someone who:

• Thinks like a marketer, not just an editor

• Can take ownership of projects

• Is highly organized and detail-oriented

• Can scale with our company as we grow







To Apply



Please send:

 1. Examples of direct-response or TV-style ads you’ve created

 2. A short explanation of your workflow when creating an ad from a script

 3. Your experience with AI voiceover and B-roll sourcing

 4. Your availability and expected rate







Compensation



Flexible based on experience. Long-term opportunity with increasing workload and growth.

title: SEO Strategist & Account Manager
description:
Hawk IQ is a U.S.-based digital marketing agency that helps small businesses grow smarter and faster through data-driven SEO strategies, website optimization, AI Visibility (GEO) and Google Business Profile (GBP) management. We work with the Go High Level (GHL) CRM platform. We focus on clients needing Websites, CRM, Content Creation, Local & AI Visibility. 



We are expanding our remote team in the Philippines.



ROLE OVERVIEW:

We are hiring a proactive leader and skilled SEO Strategist to join our team. This role combines local Search Engine Optimization & AI strategy experience, client management, and continuous learning.



Initial responsibilities will require account management until revenues require an account manager. This role, with the right leadership skills, will have the opportunity to build a team and be responsible for its growth and profitability. The ideal candidate will be compensated well for that work. 



RESPONSIBILITIES:

 - Optimize Client Google Business Profiles (GBP) & AI Visibility (AIO / GEO) 

 - Conduct SEO audits, KW research, and competitor analysis for prospective clients

 - Implement on-page, off-page, and technical SEO strategies

 - Create backlinks and manage link-building campaigns

 - Manage and oversee SEO-friendly content

 - Coordinate client campaigns and reporting

 - Proactively stay updated on SEO and Google algorithm changes



QUALIFICATIONS:

- 2+ years SEO experience (small business preferred)

 - Strong knowledge of GBP optimization, on-page & off-page SEO

 - Experience with SEO tools (GA4, GTM, GSC, SEMrush, Ahrefs, etc.)

 - Excellent English communication skills

 - Organized and able to manage multiple clients

 - Google Sheets, Docs & Go High Level CRM experience required 



COMPENSATION & BENEFITS:

 - First 30 days (Trial): $650 USD

 - 60–90 days (Advanced Trial): $850 USD

 - 90–180 days (Full Employment after performance of skills): $1,050 - $1,250 / month (QTR Bonus based on performance reviews) 

 - Long-term, remote position with growth opportunities

 - Flexible hours (must overlap some U.S. time)

 - Candidate responsible for own ongoing training and development



IMPORTANT REQUIREMENTS:

 - Must work exclusively for Hawk IQ (no other agency / freelance work allowed)

 - Reliable internet connection with backup

 - Full focus and dedication to Hawk IQ clients



WHY JOIN US?

Be part of a growing digital marketing agency where your skills directly impact small business success. If you prove your work and skill, you will be compensated above PH market rates. If you are ready to grow your career in Digital Marketing, help build a great team and earn a competitive salary, we want to hear from you!

title: Full-Time Bookkeeper
description:
Remote – Philippines

Full-Time | Long-Term

Compensation: USD $11,000–$13,000 annually



Role overview:

We are seeking a reliable and detail-oriented Bookkeeper to manage daily accounting operations and maintain accurate financial records. This role also acts as the primary HR point of contact. 



This role reports directly to the Controller / Finance & Accounting Manager and is responsible for transaction processing, reconciliations, and preparation of monthly financial documentation.



KEY RESPONSIBILITIES: 



Daily accounting operations:

 * Record and classify financial transactions

 * Manage accounts payable and receivable

 * Process payroll and contractor payments

 * Maintain general ledger accuracy

 * Send out the daily financial summary or performance

 * Generate the weekly P&L and Cash Flow Forecast



Reconciliations:

 * Perform monthly bank reconciliations

 * Reconcile credit card statements

 * Reconcile Shopify payouts to bank deposits

 * Prepare reconciliation schedules for review



Month-end Preparation:

 * Prepare draft monthly financial statements

 * Compile supporting documentation

 * Flag discrepancies for review



Documentation & compliance support:

* Organize financial records for CPA and tax filing

* Maintain structured and accurate financial files

* Follow established accounting SOPs





What this role DOES NOT DO:

 * Approve financial statements

 * Lead forecasting or budgeting

 * Provide executive-level strategy

 * Design chart of accounts





Qualifications:

 * 2–5 years bookkeeping experience

 * Strong QuickBooks proficiency

 * Strong Excel or Google Sheets skills

 * High attention to detail

 * Organized and deadline-driven

 * Strong written and verbal English skills

 * Ecommerce experience preferred

title: Account Manager / Customer Success (SaaS | High Growth | Remote)
description:
We are hiring a high-performance Account Manager / Customer Success professional to join our fast-growing SaaS company, ATHOS. This role is ideal for someone who is highly intelligent, organized, and excellent at communication. You will be responsible for onboarding new clients, building strong relationships, and ensuring long-term customer success.



ATHOS is an AI-driven training and simulation platform used by insurance and sales organizations to improve performance, compliance, and efficiency. We are growing rapidly and need someone who can own the client experience from the 
nt a deal is closed through long-term retention and expansion.



This is a high-impact role with significant growth potential as the company scales.



What You Will Do



• Own the client experience after the sales demo and close

• Lead onboarding and implementation for new clients

• Help clients set up their accounts and workflows

• Coordinate agreements, contracts, and account setup

• Become a deep product expert in ATHOS

• Train clients on how to use the platform effectively

• Support clients with ongoing questions and needs

• Work closely with sales, product, and leadership teams

• Identify upsell and expansion opportunities

• Help improve onboarding and customer success processes

• Maintain strong, proactive communication with clients

• Track customer health, retention, and engagement

• Collect product feedback and relay insights to the team



Who This Is For



We are looking for someone who:

• Is extremely organized and detail-oriented

• Is highly intelligent and learns quickly

• Is proactive and takes ownership

• Is excellent at communication (written and verbal)

• Enjoys working in a fast-paced startup environment

• Wants to grow into a leadership role as the company scales

• Thinks strategically about customer relationships



Required Experience



• Experience in SaaS customer success, account management, or implementation

• Experience onboarding clients or managing customer relationships

• Strong communication and relationship-building skills

• Ability to understand complex products and explain them clearly

• Strong problem-solving and critical thinking skills

• Comfortable using tools like Slack, Zoom, CRM systems, and project tools



Preferred Experience



• Startup or high-growth environment

• Sales or closing experience

• Experience with training or onboarding

• Insurance, healthcare, or compliance-heavy industries

• AI, SaaS, or B2B technology platforms



Why Join ATHOS



• Work directly with founders and leadership

• High-growth company with long-term opportunity

• Significant ownership and responsibility

• Opportunity to shape the customer experience

• Career growth into leadership roles

• Remote work with a strong and ambitious team





Application Instructions (Important)



To apply, please include:

 1. Your resume

 2. A short explanation of your experience with SaaS or customer success

 3. A 30–45 second Loom video answering:

 • Why you are a strong fit for this role

 • Your experience working with clients

 • Why you want to join a high-growth startup



Applications without the Loom video will not be reviewed.



Compensation



Competitive salary plus performance-based bonuses. Long-term growth and advancement opportunities.

title: Website Designer Needed - Modern One Page Sales Page for Online Course
description:
I am looking for a skilled website designer to create a modern, sleek, premium one page sales page for my online course. This is not a basic landing page job. I want a clean, high-end, conversion-focused design similar in quality and feel to Ali Abdaal’s Part-Time YouTuber Academy page: 







Here is my current rough draft page that contains the copy and layout structure that must be used and improved visually: 







Your job is to take my existing copy and transform it into a clean, modern, premium, trustworthy, high-converting, mobile-optimized sales page. I want strong typography, excellent spacing, clear hierarchy, professional CTA sections, and a polished finish. 



The page should feel high value and credible, not flashy or over-the-top.



I do not want cheap template designs, cluttered layouts, excessive animations, “guru” style funnels, or generic Fiverr-level work. I am looking for someone with a strong eye for detail who understands layout psychology and user flow.



My website is currently built on WordPress. Please confirm if you can work within WordPress and explain whether you recommend Elementor, a custom theme, Webflow, or another solution, and why you recommend that approach.



The scope includes full design of one long-form sales page, full desktop and mobile optimization, clean layout hierarchy, CTA button design, light conversion optimization improvements, and ensuring the page loads fast and looks modern.



The copy is already written. This is primarily a design and layout execution job, not a copywriting job.



If your work is high quality and your pricing is competitive, there may be an opportunity to redesign my entire website, redesign several other websites I own, and work on ongoing landing pages and funnels. I am looking for someone I can potentially build a long-term working relationship with.



Expected budget range is $200 to $400 depending on quality and experience. Please provide your fixed price for the full project. If you believe your rate should be higher, explain why and provide strong examples to justify it.



To filter serious applicants, please follow these instructions carefully.



Start your application with the word SLEEK so I know you have read the entire post. 



Provide three examples of modern sales pages you have personally designed, not templates. 



Confirm the platform you recommend and why.

Provide your fixed price and estimated timeframe to complete the project.



Applications that do not follow these instructions will not be reviewed.



I am looking to hire within the next 7 days.



If you take pride in building premium websites, care about small details, and can deliver a modern, high-quality sales page, I would like to hear from you.



Ben

title: Medical VA
description:
We are looking for a reliable Medical Virtual Assistant to support our optometry clinic located in San Gabriel, CA. Tasks include answering calls, scheduling appointments, verifying patients’ insurance benefits, and billing insurance for services rendered. Prior medical VA or healthcare experience is a plus, along with strong English communication and attention to detail.



Work Hours and Schedule: 9:00 AM – 6:00 PM Pacific Standard Time, Monday to Saturday

Work Duration: 8 hours plus 1 hour break



Send  your application to 
 with the subject “MED VA Applicant.” 

Along with your resume/CV, please also submit a 1-minute introduction video. This is required since the role involves speaking directly with patients. Applications without an intro video will not be considered.

title: Video Editor - Facebook Ads
description:
We're looking for a highly skilled, marketing-minded video editor to join our E-Commerce brand part-time.



You will be responsible for editing short-form
 and Instagram ad creatives that drive real sales results, so you need to think like a marketer, not just an editor.



If you're someone who obsesses over hooks, understands why some videos stop the scroll and others don't, and can execute fast without sacrificing quality, this might be the position for you.



Responsibilities:



- Edit raw UGC and branded footage into high-converting short-form video ads for
 and Instagram

- Apply brand-consistent editing style across all creatives while adapting to different ad angles and formats

- Follow detailed creative briefs precisely and execute them without needing multiple revision rounds

- Stay up to date on what is currently performing in the DTC and skincare/beauty space

- Deliver edits on tight timelines, including same-day turnaround when necessary



Requirements:



- Highly experienced in CapCut and/or Adobe Premiere Pro (please specify which in your application)

- Strong understanding of paid ads content, specifically how to optimize performance metrics (hook rate, hold rate, pacing, CTR)

- Fluent in English with excellent written communication skills

- Experience editing for eCommerce or DTC brands is strongly preferred

- Highly organized, detail-oriented, and able to follow instructions with autonomous ability

- Available on a consistent daily basis and responsive during working hours





Compensation and Growth:



- Pay-per-video model with highly competitive hourly rates

- Based on recent months, our part-time editors are compensated $500+ USD/month and growing rapidly

- High performers are fast-tracked into salary raises, promotion to a full-time role, and long-term growth opportunity



How to Apply:



To be considered, your application MUST include all of the following:



1) Your resume or CV highlighting relevant experience in video editing, eCommerce, marketing, or advertising

2) A portfolio of past video editing work, specifically ad creatives or short-form content (links preferred)

3) Written answers to all five applicant questions below



Applications missing any of these three items will be automatically denied.



Applicant Questions:



1) How experienced are you in editing with Capcut/Premiere Pro? What E-Commerce brands have you previously worked with before (if any)?



2) Do you have any viral and/or successful videos you've directly contributed to editing-wise? If so, can you provide proof of metrics & the video?



3) What separates a video ad that stops the scroll from one that gets skipped in the first 2 seconds? Give us a specific example from your own work or from an ad you've studied closely.



4) What's your typical turnaround time from when you first receive a project?
